settings.content: Enable or disable theme features. Some features may require additional configuration in other settings sections.

settings.label: Enable Enquiry System
settings.info: Allows customers to enquire about products

settings.label: Enable B2B Features
settings.info: Includes delivery calculation, accept alternatives, offload confirmation, mega menu

settings.label: Enable Shipping Protection
settings.info: Auto-adds shipping protection at checkout (3% of cart value)

settings.label: Enable Tile Calculator
settings.info: Shows square meter calculations for tile and flooring products

settings.label: Enable Grouped Products
settings.info: Allows product grouping and variant options

settings.label: Advanced Unavailable Product Handling
settings.info: Enhanced messaging and alternatives for out-of-stock items

settings.label: Use Extended Icon Library
settings.info: Includes additional icon assets for enhanced UI

settings.label: Enable Geographic Context
settings.info: Adjusts content based on customer location (GB/Ireland/US)

settings.label: Enable Product Reviews
settings.info: Shows product review integration (requires Reviews.io or similar)
